html:
I made a decision today.

There world is full of hatred, envy, dishonesty, greed and hostility.

My life is in ruin there is no positive outlook that it improves.

No one loves me and no one never will.

I became socially alienated and no one cares about my fate.

All i get is insults, despise and violence.

My health condition is preventing me from making anything better.

My passions brought me only unhappiness.

The rumors people spread about me are scandalous.

There is absolutely no appreciation of what I do and everyone treats me with despise.

No one respects me neither my privacy and that makes them happy.

People understand only power.

Everyone lies.

I finally understood that I'm an idiot and everyone else is smart, and, this is entirely my fault.

So I am taking my own life away.

God have mercy on my soul.


Mirosław Zbigniew Leśniak aka wsky/wintersky

PS: I am not an organ donor and I prefer cremation.
title: A note
